definition: nightjar (nocturnal bird in the family Caprimulgidae)
(bird species of China) Vaurie's nightjar (Caprimulgus centralasicus)
(bird species of China) Egyptian nightjar (Caprimulgus aegyptius)
(bird species of China) grey nightjar (Caprimulgus jotaka)
(bird species of China) savanna nightjar (Caprimulgus affinis)
(bird species of China) European nightjar (Caprimulgus europaeus)
(bird species of China) great eared nightjar (Eurostopodus macrotis)
(bird species of China) large-tailed nightjar (Caprimulgus macrurus)

sentences.english: The GOATSUCKER is a strange owl-like bird .
sentences.chinese: 夜鷹是種貓頭鷹似的怪鳥。

sentences.english: It was the nightingale that lived in the woods.
Why won't the whimpering whippoorwill whistle?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼哀怨的北美夜鷹小聲不說話了？

sentences.english: Nighthawks were the world's first stealth fighters, planes that were very hard for radar to detect.
sentences.chinese: 夜鷹是世界第一代隱形戰鬥機，很難被雷達發現。

sentences.english: The nighthawk is anti-japan union calls a instructor cosmos sulphureus.
sentences.chinese: “夜鷹”便是抗聯一團指導員黃秋英。
